welcome_message_body: Welcome to Reston, a charming city known for its beautiful lakes, outdoor activities, and vibrant community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that Reston has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport houses most of the airport's facilities including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is one of the four concourses at Washington Dulles International Airport and primarily serves international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is one of the four concourses at Washington Dulles International Airport and primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is one of the four concourses at Washington Dulles International Airport and primarily serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is one of the four concourses at Washington Dulles International Airport and primarily serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is the largest and busiest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A primarily serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C is the newest terminal at the airport, serving domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport handles all commercial flights and houses a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport is used for private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport, serving both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
